code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import'./Navbar.css';import{Button}from'./Button';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Navbar(){const[click,setClick]=useState(false);const[button,setButton]=useState(true);const handleClick=()=>setClick(!click);const closeMobileMenu=()=>setClick(false);const showButton=()=>{if(window.innerWidth<=960){setButton(false);}else{setButton(true);}};useEffect(()=>{showButton();},[]);window.addEventListener('resize',showButton);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:"navbar",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"navbar-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:"/",className:"navbar-logo",onClick:closeMobileMenu,children:["Will's Gaming Site ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fab fa-typo3"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"menu-icon",onClick:handleClick,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:click?"fas fa-times":"fas fa-bars"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{className:click?"nav-menu active":"nav-menu",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"nav-item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/services",className:"nav-links",onClick:closeMobileMenu,children:"Not"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"nav-item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/products",className:"nav-links",onClick:closeMobileMenu,children:"A"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"nav-item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/sign-up",className:"nav-links",onClick:closeMobileMenu,children:"real site"})})]}),button&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{buttonStyle:"btn--outline",children:"TEST"})]})})});}export default Navbar;
